login.title: Maraba da Komowa
login.subtitle: Shiga zuwa asusun ku na SheBalance
login.learnMore: Koyi ƙarin bayani game da SheBalance

signup.title: Ƙirƙiri Asusun Ku
signup.subtitle: Shiga SheBalance ku fara gudanar da kasuwancin ku
signup.phoneHelper: Shigar da lambar waya ta Najeriya tare da lambar ƙasa (+234) ko farawa da 0
signup.passwordHelper: Kalmar sirri dole ta zama aƙalla haruffa 8
signup.agentToggleHelper: Kunna wannan idan kuna son yin rajista a matsayin wakili na SheBalance
signup.agentNamePlaceholder: Shigar da sunan wakilin ku na musamman
signup.agentNameHelper: Wannan sunan dole ya zama na musamman kuma za a yi amfani da shi don gane ku a matsayin wakili
signup.agreeText: Ta ƙirƙirar asusu, kun yarda da mu

emailVerification.sentVerificationLink: Mun aika muku da hanyar tabbatarwa zuwa email ɗinku
emailVerification.checkInbox: Don Allah duba akwatin saƙonku kuma danna hanyar don tabbatar da asusun ku
emailVerification.didntReceive: Ba ku karɓi email ɗin ba?
emailVerification.checkEmailAgain: Don Allah duba email ɗinku kuma
emailVerification.checkSpamHelper: Duba akwatin email ɗinku da babban fayil
emailVerification.verificationStepEmailSent: Mun aika muku da lambar tabbatarwa zuwa email ɗinku
emailVerification.verificationStepEnterCode: Duba akwatin saƙonku ku shigar da lambar mai lambobi 6
emailVerification.verificationStepVerified: Za a tabbatar da email ɗinku kuma za ku iya ci gaba

forgotPassword.title: Sake Saita Kalmar Sirri
forgotPassword.subtitle: Shigar da email ɗinku don karɓar hanyar sake saita kalmar sirri
forgotPassword.resetLinkSent: An aika hanyar sake saita kalmar sirri!

resetPassword.title: Sake Saita Kalmar Sirri
resetPassword.subtitle: Shigar da email ɗinku don karɓar hanyar sake saita
resetPassword.passwordHelper: Kalmar sirri dole ta zama aƙalla haruffa 8
resetPassword.passwordReset: An sake saita kalmar sirri cikin nasara!
resetPassword.securityNoticeText: Bayan sabunta kalmar sirrin ku, za a tura ku zuwa shafin shiga don shiga da sabbin bayanan ku.
resetPassword.rememberPassword: Kuna tunawa da kalmar sirrin ku?
resetPassword.secureEncryptionDesc: Ana ɓoye kalmar sirrin ku da tsaron masana'antu
resetPassword.accountProtectionDesc: Matakan tsaro masu ƙarfi suna kare bayanan kasuwancin ku
resetPassword.verifiedAccessDesc: Ku kaɗai kuke iya shiga da canza bayanan asusun ku
